[[Boing (Italy)]] | subsid = | homepage = | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Turner Broadcasting System Italia Srl''' is one of Turner's divisions in Europe. It is headquartered in Milan with a second office in Rome. ==Divisions== * [[Cartoon Network (Italy)]] * [[Boomerang (Italy)]] * [[Boing (Italy)]] ([[Mediaset]] 51% and Turner 49%) ==See also== * [[The Walt Disney Company Italy]] ==References== * [http://www.alacrastore.com/company-snapshot/Turner_Broadcasting_System_Italia_Srl-3714977 Turner Broadcasting System Italia Srl] * [http://www.awn.com/news/internet-and-interactive/cartoon-network-channel-goes-mobile-italy Cartoon Network Channel Goes Mobile in Italy] * [http://www.mediajobs.it/candidati_maggiori_dettagli_annunci/1762,Programming_Supervisor_20_12_2010_TURNER_BROADCASTING_SYSTEM_ITALIA_S_R_L.html TURNER BROADCASTING SYSTEM ITALIA S.R.L.] ==External links== * [http://europe.turnerinfo.com Turner Info Europe] * [http://www.turneradsales.co.uk Turner Adsales] * [http://www.cartoonnetwork.it/ Cartoon Network (Italy)] * [http://www.boomerangtv.it/ Boomerang (Italy)] * [http://www.boingtv.it/ Boing (Italy)] {{TBS}} {{Time Warner}} {{Italian television stations}} [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Italy]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Europe]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System]] [[Category:Italian brands]] [[Category:Media companies of Italy]] [[Category:Companies based in Milan]] [[Category:Time Warner subsidiaries]] [[Category:Italian subsidiaries of foreign multinational companies]]
